mapper.insert: insert into present_test(presentid, productno, userno) values(presentPK.nextval, #{productNo}, #{userNo})
mapper.select: select distinct(f.followerid) followerid, u.user_name username, u.user_birth userbirth, u.user_phone userphone, u.user_email useremail, u.user_address useraddress, u.create_date createdate, p.presentId presentId, pr.productname productname, (substr(pr.productimage, instr(pr.productimage, '(', 1, 1)+1, (instr(pr.productimage, ')', 1, 1)-instr(pr.productimage, '(', 1, 1)-1))) productimage, pr.productprice productprice, p.presentCount presentCount, p.presentDate presentDate from user_info u, friend_test f, present_test p, product_test pr where u.user_id = f.followerid and p.userNo = u.user_id and p.productno = pr.productno and f.followerid = #{followerid}
